LanguageData.Caves.label: pluaiseanna
LanguageData.Caves.description: Tá pluaiseanna beaga snoite isteach sna carraigeacha anseo.
LanguageData.Coast.label: cósta
LanguageData.Coast.description: Tá an tíl seo suite ar an gcósta.
LanguageData.Mountain.label: sliabh
LanguageData.Mountain.description: Tá an tíl seo suite ar mhala sléibhe.
LanguageData.River.label: abhann
LanguageData.UndergroundCave.label: pluais faoi thalamh
